title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Design and Application of Microfluidic Paper-Based Analytical Devices (μPADs)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of μPAD and replicate the manufacturing process of paper-based microfluidic devices in a simulated environment.
Learners can design μPAD experimental procedures applying acid-base titration methods and conduct virtual experiments in a VR environment.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate error factors by comparatively analyzing traditional titration data and μPAD experimental results.
Learners can design μPAD educational modules at the high school/college level and develop teaching-learning guidelines.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
